entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Loop cloning misses definitions for fields of promoted structs #61040
  • Int32Converter tolerates outrageous syntax 0X+FFFFFFFF #61039
  • DateTime.Parse throw FormatException in centos7.9 #61038
  • Convert empty string to number in base throws AOORException #61036
  • Race condition in MemoryCache will crash the process #61032
  • dotnet support android sdk, runtime #61031

Closed

  • Get mangled name #61041

PullRequests

Created

  • Disallow parsing '0X+F' as a valid integer #61043
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [arm64] JIT: Optimize zero-extend for byte/short to uint/ulong via & 0xFF.. #61042
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [arm64] JIT: Fold "A * B + C" to MADD/MSUB #61037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [arm64] JIT: Fix IsContainableImmed for arm64 v8.1 or higher #61035
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Some VN refactoring #61034
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use SIMD operations in genCodeForInitBlkUnroll and increase INITBLK_UNROLL_LIMIT to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] add support for macOS 12 #61028
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 6.0.x
  • Fix common workflow issues #61027
    community-contribution

Merged

  • Add a fallback RuntimeProductVersion in runtime_version.h #60994
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use LastIndexOf in MSBuild for a single char #60450
  • Fix to run all the tests for the scheduled builds, as intended #61029
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Throwing `FormatException` when a required property from `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel` is empy #60842
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix various dump generation issues for VS4Mac #60995
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Fix GetType called on ptr constrained to Nullable` #61020
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • disable sending NT Authority in TLS handshake if specific trust was specified #60988
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Seed the unified System.Security.Cryptography.dll #61025
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • CI matrix change: Add OSX 12 arm #59085
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: limited version of forward substitution for some relops #61023
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64: addressing modes #61026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0] [mono/win] Increase stack size (reserve) to 8MB #60561
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.1
  • [IGNORE] trying wasm pipelines #61018
  • Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build #60675
    community-contribution
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • lock protect nullability cache of symbolic regex node #60942
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
